0.1.name: wordpress/wp-campaign-manager
0.1.description:
WP Campaign Manager, it is possible to simply add a shortcode to display the campaign banners while posts. Possible to manage the campaign on the dashboard. Super useful. Header image created by @luchino__

Usage

Easy to use it!

  1. 'Add new' and save.
  2. Remember 'post id'. You can find it on url /wp-admin/post.php?post=10&action=edit
  3. Edit your post, input [wcm-show id=post_id], save.
